Posts.Content: I have been on Tamoxifen for 4 months and I have not gained extra weight. The hot flushs are worse than the menopause, I had that too! Â and have ruined my sleep pattern but I hope to find coping strategies. Bone density protection feels a positive and that helps psychologically. I hope you will not find it as bad as you fear, Good Luck
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen It Sounds Awful Is it Really That Bad?

Posts.Content: If you look at the NICE site there are guidelines for breast cancer treatments so as I understand it the doctors follow those. This will mean comparison will be more straightforward of any other differences
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy.... advice please
